hanzi-su-wiki:
燭

Значения

Свет

Мнемоника

Червяк 虫 — светлячок. Показаны голова и туловище 勹. Светится огнём 火 в темноте.

Варианты

烛

zhú
candle; (literary) to illuminate
свеча; (литературный) осветить

heisig_chinese_memo: After the incident where the insect made a pitiful voiced sound under the spider's turbid venom, you decide to free it. Immediately it is attracted to the candlelight and flies into the fire. Bugger!

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: There is no fire that an insect likes.  So light some candles and enjoy the fresh smells and calming flame while the insects are deterred.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " fire " and " shu ", the original meaning is torch and torch. "Shuowen": "Ting Liao fire candles. From the fire, the sound of the Shu." "Ritual-Shi Yunli": "From the car to the second ride, hold the candle in front of the horse." Zheng Xuan's note: "The apostle holds the torch in front of the fire. Tao."

" Candle " can mean candles. The Southern Dynasties Chen Houzhu "From the King to the King" fifth: "Thinking of the King is like a candle in the night, weeping with cock."

" Candle " also means to illuminate. "Zhuangzi•Tianyun": "I play it again with the sum of yin and yang, and the candle with the sun and the moon."

" Candle " also means lighting. Song Luyou "A Stormy Night on October 28th": "If you dare to open the door, you can't blow the fire."

" Candle " also expresses insight. "Han Feizi-Lonely Anger": "A man of wisdom must be far-sighted and observant, and if he is not observant, he cannot be private."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " fire " and " shu ", the original meaning is torch and torch.
humanum_full_description:
從「火」，「蜀」聲，本義為火炬、火把。《說文》：「庭燎火燭也。从火，蜀聲。」《儀禮‧士昏禮》：「從車二乘，執燭前馬。」鄭玄注：「使徒役持炬火居前炤道。」

　　「燭」可表示蠟燭。南朝陳後主〈自君之出矣〉之五：「思君如夜燭，垂淚著雞鳴。」

　　「燭」也表示照亮。《莊子‧天運》：「吾又奏之以陰陽之和，燭之以日月之明。」

　　「燭」亦表示點燃。宋陸游〈十月二十八日夜風雨大作〉：「拄門那敢開，吹火不得燭。」

　　「燭」還表示洞悉。《韓非子‧孤憤》：「智術之士，必遠見而明察，不明察不能燭私。」
humanum_short_description: 從「火」，「蜀」聲，本義為火炬、火把。

①用線繩或葦子做中心，周圍包上蠟油，點着取亮的東西(古代亦稱“火炬”)：蠟燭。花燭。燭光。燭淚。燭臺。風燭殘年。
②洞悉：洞燭其奸。
③燈泡瓦特數的俗稱：十五燭的燈泡。

Hanzi: 烛
Story: There is no fire that an insect likes. So light some candles and enjoy the fresh smells and calming flame while the insects are deterred.
Kind: traditional

從「 火 」，「 蜀 」聲，本義為火炬、火把。《說文》：「庭燎火燭也。从火，蜀聲。」《儀禮‧士昏禮》：「從車二乘，執燭前馬。」鄭玄注：「使徒役持炬火居前炤道。」 「 燭 」可表示蠟燭。南朝陳後主〈自君之出矣〉之五：「思君如夜燭，垂淚著雞鳴。」 「 燭 」也表示照亮。《莊子‧天運》：「吾又奏之以陰陽之和，燭之以日月之明。」 「 燭 」亦表示點燃。宋陸游〈十月二十八日夜風雨大作〉：「拄門那敢開，吹火不得燭。」 「 燭 」還表示洞悉。《韓非子‧孤憤》：「智術之士，必遠見而明察，不明察不能燭私。」
From the sound of " fire" and " shu", the original meaning is torch and torch. "Shuowen": "Ting Liao fire candles. From the fire, the sound of the Shu." "Ritual-Shi Yunli": "From the car to the second ride, hold the candle in front of the horse." Zheng Xuan's note: "The apostle holds the torch in front of the fire. Tao." " Candle" can mean candles. The Southern Dynasties Chen Houzhu "From the King to the King" fifth: "Thinking of the King is like a candle in the night, weeping with cock." " Candle" also means to illuminate. "Zhuangzi•Tianyun": "I play it again with the sum of yin and yang, and the candle with the sun and the moon." " Candle" also means lighting. Song Luyou "A Stormy Night on October 28th": "If you dare to open the door, you can't blow the fire." " Candle" also expresses insight. "Han Feizi-Lonely Anger": "A man of wisdom must be far-sighted and observant, and if he is not observant, he cannot be private."

燭字的基本解释

燭
zhú
见“烛”。

燭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhú］
［《廣韻》之欲切，入燭，章。］
亦作“爥1”。“烛1”的繁体字。
(1)火炬；火把。
(2)蜡烛。
(3)点燃；燃着。
(4)照亮；照见。
(5)指显露，呈现。
(6)明察；洞悉。
(7)通“”。肛门。参见“燭營”。
(8)星名。参见“燭星”。
(9)俗称电灯的功率单位。即瓦。
(10)量词。盏。
(11)姓。春秋郑有烛之武。见《左传·僖公三十年》。

燭字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　燭； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页685第11
【唐韻】之欲切【集韻】【韻會】朱欲切，?音囑。【說文】庭燎火燭也。【廣韻】燈燭。【禮·曲禮】燭至起。【周禮·秋官·司烜氏】以共祭祀之明齍明燭。　又【玉篇】照也。【前漢·武帝紀】日月所燭，莫不率?。　又【爾雅·釋天】四時和謂之玉燭。【註】道光照也。【梁書·?文帝紀】太平玉燭，爾乃議之。　又【楚辭·天問】日出不到燭龍何燿。　又星名。【史記·天官書】燭星，狀如太白，其出也不行，見則滅，如星非星，如雲非雲，名曰歸邪。歸邪出，必有歸國者。漢元鳳四年，燭星見奎婁閒。　又南天燭，藥名。赤者名文燭。木而似草。故又名南燭草。又石燭，一名水肥，一名石脂，一名石液。　又姓。【左傳·僖二十八年】若使燭之武見秦君，師必退。　又去聲。【前漢·武帝紀】見光集於雲壇，一夜三燭。【註】服虔曰：燭，音炷。師古讀如字。　又【唐韻正】音朱。【張衡·東京賦】德寓天覆，輝烈光燭，狹三王之趢趗，軼五帝之長驅。　又【唐韻正】後魏渴燭渾民，亦作可足渾民，又作可朱渾民。

燭字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
燭字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
candle
zhú
See "candle".
candle
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhú］
[The desire to cut in "Guang Yun", into the candle, chapter. ]
Also known as "爥1". Traditional characters for "Candle 1".
(1) Torch; torch.
(2) Candles.
(3) Ignite; burn.
(4) To illuminate; to see.
(5) Refers to revealing and presenting.
(6) Observation; Insight.
(7) Pass "". anus. See "Candle Camp".
(8) Star name. See "Candle Star".
(9) The unit of power commonly known as an electric light. Namely tile.
(10) Quantifiers. Cup.
(11) Last name. In the Spring and Autumn Period, Zheng Youzhu's martial arts. See "Thirty Years of Zuo Zhuan·Xi Gong".
candle
